vote.title: Authorize an increase in the homestead property tax exemption for persons who are disabled or 65 or older from $139,400 to $153,400 beginning with the 2024 tax year (fiscal year beginning October 1, 2024) - Total Estimated Annual Revenue Foregone: General Fund ($5,402,040) and Debt Service Fund ($2,072,628)
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the homestead property tax exemption for persons who are disabled or 65 or older from $139,400 to $153,400 beginning with the 2024 tax year (fiscal year beginning October 1, 2024) - Total Estimated Annual Revenue Foregone: General Fund ($5,402,040) and Debt Service Fund ($2,072,628)
